p:
There was no treatment effect for net N mineralization or nitrification rates ( F 3,21 = 0.37, P = 0.78 and F 3
,21 = 0.67, P = 0.58). Mean final N levels were 0.35 mg NH + 4 kg −1 soil and 1.23 mg NO − 3 kg −1 soil, with a mean net N mineralization rate of 0.029 mg kg −1 day −1 and a mean nitrification rate of 0.028 mg kg −1 day −1.
